content: this pattern is for the intermediate beginner stitches used are single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet and the v-st one or more colors will work up a very pretty square note pattern is written for just one color but use as many as you like for stunning results see all of the projects just make your color changes at the beginning of a round come join me at my ravelry group 1 where we test patterns and host cals and swaps 1 http //www ravelry com/groups/melinda-miller-designs
